text.div:
Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae Antigen in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11086-6 Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag [Presence] in Serum
    14322-2 Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    20489-1 Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    6553-2 Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    86590-7 Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Rapid immunoassay
